text: فما منكم من احد عنه حجزين

translations.translation: and not one of you could have protected him.
And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).
and not one of you would have been able to withhold Us from doing so.
None of you would be able to prevent Us from doing this to him.
Then none among you would be his saviour.
And none of you could have prevented it from him.
And not one of you could have withheld Us from him.
and not one of you could have defended him.
And not one of you could have held Us off from him.
and none of you could have held Us off from him.
And not one of you would have withheld us from punishing him.
and none of you could have held Us off from him.
Nor could any of you withhold him (from Our wrath).
And none of you could withhold Us from (punishing) him.
not one of you could have prevented it from him.
And none of you could have restrained Us from him.
And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

[69:47] and not one of you (ahadin is the subject of mā, min being extra, used to emphasise the negation; minkum is a circumstantial qualifier referring to ahadin) could have defended him (hājizīna is the predicate of [the preceding] mā, and it is used in the plural because ahad, when employed in a negatory context, denotes a plural sense; the [suffixed] pronoun in ‘anhu refers to the Prophet), in other words, there is none to prevent Us from punishing him.
(And not one of you could have held Us off from him) He says: no one of you could have held Us back from Muhammad (pbuh).

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَمَا مِنكُمْ مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَاجِزِينَ } معناه مانِعينَ

translations.translation: And His saying, {There is none of you but will come to it} [i.e., death]. This means that none of you will be prevented from it.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَمَا مِنكُمْ } أيها المكلفون { مِّنْ أَحَدٍ } حينئذٍ { عَنْهُ } أي: عن أخذه وعذابه { حَاجِزِينَ } [الحاقة: 47] مانعين
 يمنعوننا عن بطشه وتعذيبه
 يعني: إن محمدً صلى الله عليه وسلم لا يفتري علينا شيئاً لأجلكم أيها الكافرون
 وهو صلى الله عليه وسلم يعلم منَّا أنه لو افترى علينا شيئاً من تلقاء نفسه
 ونسبه إلينا ظلماً وزوراً لعذبناه عذاباً شديداً
 بحيث لا يقدر أحد أن يدفع عذابنا عنه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فما منكم } 
 الخطاب للناس
 أو المسلمين
 { مِن أحدٍ } " من " زائدة
 { عنه } أي: عن القتل أو المقتول
 { حاجزين } دافعين
 وجمعَه
 وإن كان وصفاً لـ " أحد " لأنه في معنى الجماعة لأنَّ النكرة بعد النفي تعم
